content:
Currently, the invite user modal is actually an overlay, which also has its own URL. As per #22957, we should migrate it to a modal (dialog_widget).
We can either keep the URL logic or consider removing the URL and just have it open on top of the settings overlay.
Suggestions?

From a user perspective, I'm not aware of a reason why having the URL would be important. I guess it would prevent us from using a direct link in the help center (https://chat.zulip.org/help/invite-new-users#send-email-invitations).

What are the down sides of keeping the URL logic?
The main real benefit of it having a URL is the direct link from the /help/ page.
